Python的lambda表达式

13 July 2015

Python的lambda表达式

无参数
a = lambda: 'hello, world!'
print a() # hello, world!
print lambda: 'hello, world!' # <function <lambda> at 0x........>
有参数
sum = lambda x,y = 10: x + y
print sum(1) # 11
print sum(2, 2) # 4
